We share personal information with third parties based on the principle of least access, only as necessary for our business purposes:

3. Collection and Use of Personal Information  Information We Collect  Unhush collects personal information necessary for the provision of its services.

This Privacy Statement outlines Unhush's practices regarding the collection, use, and sharing of personal information through its website, https://un-hush.com/ , and platform, https://www.app.un-hush.com , (collectively, the "Services").
